main event: Bright circular objects with a yellow glow were observed in the sky in Morgantown, West Virginia on June 26, 1962.
interesting points: Objects were observed changing intensity and color during the sighting,The objects exhibited peculiar motion and were seen flying at a speed of around 200 mph in formation,Insufficient data was recorded on speed and direction of movement,The sighting was reported to Project Blue Book,The report includes a blurry photograph of a dark-colored object in the sky.
sighted object: circular dark objects with a yellow glow
